title: Searge:1.8不会再有功能性更新
author: junyi5353
txt_content:
@SeargeDP: Sorry, no new features in 1.8.x updates. We are focusing on performance and stability when it comes to 1.8 and new features are made for 1.9
@SeargeSP：抱歉，在1.8任何新版中将不会再包含功能性更新，我们正专注于改善1.8的显示能力和稳定性，当然也有适用于1.9的功能性更新。
